description:
Broderick has done video work before, but I feel like it is the first time he has been shot "professionally". He still seems like a newbie and is unsure about it all. I think he just needed a bit more direction and confidence, especially when working in a multi-cam environment. In other words, I had to tell him pretty much what to do, so unlike some guys who have done video work before, he needed coaching.
But that doesn't mean the solo is not great. He is naturally very horny, and got his 7 inch cock standing at attention in no time. His long cock is nestled nicely in a thick mound of natural pubic hair. His cock looks big on his small 140 pound body. He also has a tasty ass!
Broderick has a very strict diet. All organic, and the kid has not a bit of fat on him. He skateboards a lot, and actually spent time skating around the studio grounds. He showed up at a good time. I had a couple cancellations, so he stayed about a week and filled in here and there.
Next week he and Glenn get some oral going, and over the next month, you will likely see him again soon.
title: Broderick - Solo
